SELECT T2.id as id, T2.group_code as groupCode, T2.group_name as groupName FROM ( SELECT @r AS _id, (SELECT @r := parent_id FROM bms_group WHERE id = _id) AS parent_id, @l := @l + 1 AS level FROM (SELECT @r := #{id}, @l := 0) vars, bms_group h WHERE @r <> 0) T1 JOIN bms_group T2 ON T1._id = T2.id
JOIN bms_group T3 ON t3.id = T2.parent_id where T3.parent_id = 0
